markdownRemark.html:
www.pryoritytraining.com is looking for two Flash developers who are familiar with Flash 8 and AS 2. Here ae a list of requirements;

  • function to retrieve data from an XML file.

  • modify (customize) a Quiz component: add option to play a sound and display a graphic for feedback

  • some customized quiz exercises (not using components).

  • function for bookmarking

Please contact Julia at her email address, julia@pryoritytraining.com, or by phone, 904-491-5007.

frontmatter.title: Flash developers needed in Fernandina Beach, Fl.
